snippet.title: Escape Together: Secrets of the Professor | Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Teaser Video for Escape Together: Secrets of the Professor. We are getting closer to a state that can go to beta-testing, so here is a little teaser of the multiplayer aspect and mechanics.

Subscribe to follow our journey with this game and to get notified when the final trailer is released!

Check it out on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3393820 
Check it out on Meta Quest store: https://vr.meta.me/s/1TIe1Od0bcQYYFR
